title: Bon Appétit!
detail_text: <:th_ch0005/>Welcome, Lanzhu-san! Come in!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>Thank you for inviting me, Rin!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>You can sit over there~. Kayochin and Maki-chan will be here soon, So let’s have a snack while we wait for them. Rin tried making some pudding to welcome you.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>Pudding!? Lanzhu loves pudding!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Rin isn’t that good at cooking, so Rin hopes it turned out well....! Here, please help yourself.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>Kyaaah! Thanks for the food! *Munch*.... Hnn~, what a unique flavor!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>I-, is that so? It’s my first time getting that compliment nya~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>*Munch munch*.... What secret ingredient is this? It tastes slightly bitter.... No, it’s somewhat spicy, isn’t it? It’s warm in my stomach....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Eh!? Did Rin mess up again nya....? Sorry, Lanzhu-san, you don’t have to eat the rest.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>No, you made this for us, Rin. Lanzhu would like to eat them all! My stomach is trained for this! Don’t worry!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
